summary:
The Security Council:

Reaffirms previous resolutions and presidential statements on Sudan, and its commitment to Sudan's sovereignty, unity, independence, and territorial integrity.

Takes note of the Secretary-General's report on Sudan and UNITAMS' activities.

1. Extends UNITAMS' mandate until 3 June 2023.
2. Requests the Secretary-General to report to the Security Council every 90 days on UNITAMS' mandate implementation.
3. Decides to remain actively seized of the matter.
